mapper.select: select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark, type from fund_transaction order by code, transaction_date

select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark, type from fund_transaction where type = 0 order by code, transaction_date
mapper.insert: insert into fund_transaction (code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark, type) values (#{code}, #{applicationDate}, #{transactionDate}, #{confirmationDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{nav}, #{share}, #{tradingPlatform}, #{status}, #{mark}, #{type})
